title: [Large-scale] Research-Based Online Mathematics Learning Design Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematics Concepts and Experience with Online Learning
context.additional_context: Need for flexible learning design enabling professionals to balance academic and work commitments

learning_goals: Learners can design multimedia learning materials that minimize cognitive load in online environments
Learners can apply a process to improve learning strategies by analyzing formative assessment data
Learners can build self-directed online learning environments using metacognitive facilitation techniques
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
